1.0.name: wordpress/mootools-accessible-sortable-list
1.0.description:
MooTools Accessible Sortable List is a sortable list of your blog's categories which uses the MooTools WAI-ARIA enabled sortable list.

How to Use the List

Up arrow / Down arrow: Navigates through the items Shift + Up arrow / Shift + Down arrow: Moves the current item up / down Enter: Open the link related to the selected item
